metadata.description:
On February 22, 2022, I woke up to a sunrise unlike any other. The world’s most iconic structure was surrounded by golden light and fog that I've never seen in this city before.

After doing some research, I've learned that 222 (the day on which this was shot) symbolizes hope & spiritual growth, bringing in new and fresh possibilities. 

Web3 has done exactly that. Opened the door to new opportunities for artists all over the world. Having full ownership of my art has given me the courage to be a louder voice for female photographers.

While I have enjoyed my newfound love for Web3, it is always important to remember where you started. I was given the opportunity to post the first ever authenticated NFT on Instagram, a moment I will never forget and will always cherish. Having the ability to come back to Instagram and share my new passion in the home that helped make my career is a dream come true. 

To commemorate this milestone, I’d like to share a new edition of a very important memory to me, titled "222".

This scene only lasted for a moment, but will now live on the blockchain forever.

Edition of 22
